title: Episode #2. The Fatal Boating Accident
description:
In February of 2019, Mallory Beech was killed in a boating accident. After public outcry Paul Murdaugh was indicted for driving the boat when it crashed. There are many questions about the accident and how it was handled. This accident may be linked to the homicide of the Murdaughs. We give you details on the fatal crash and the post crash charges. #murdaugh #murdaughmurders #mallorybeech #truecrime #boating
